audioText: Quand j'étais petit, ma grand-mère jouait du piano tous les dimanches après-midi.
question: What did the grandmother do every Sunday afternoon?
explanation: The text states 'Quand j'étais petit, ma grand-mère jouait du piano tous les dimanches après-midi' - When I was little, my grandmother played the piano every Sunday afternoon. 'Jouait' is the third person singular imperfect tense of 'jouer' (to play), describing a past habit.
